sql-mapping.sql-content: SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.SR_NO, SR_TITLE, SR_DT, TO_EMPKNAME(SR_EMPID)||'('||SR_EMPID||')' AS SR_EMPID, TO_EMPKNAME((SELECT MAX(B.CONF_EMPID) FROM SR_CONFER B WHERE A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO))||'('||(SELECT MAX(B.CONF_EMPID) FROM SR_CONFER B WHERE A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO)||')' AS SR_REV_EMPID, TEL, SR_ORGCD, FIN_DT, P_EFP, SR_TYPE, TO_CDNM(SR_TYPE,'SR_GB') AS SR_TYPE_NM, TO_CDNM(VALUE_TYPE,'VALUE_TYPE') AS VALUE_TYPE, TO_CDNM(URGENT_TYPE,'URGENT_TYPE') AS URGENT_TYPE, SR_SYSTEM, SYSTEMNM, EFFECT_COMMENT, SR_REASON, SR_REASON_DETAIL, RELEASE_YN, DEVORG_COMMENT, REVORG_COMMENT, FID, PID, TO_CDNM(( SELECT MAX(B.DOC_TYPE) FROM SR_CONFER B WHERE A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO),'SR_DOC_GB')|| TO_CDNM((SELECT '-'||MAX(B.STATUS) FROM SR_CONFER B WHERE A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO),'SR_STATUS') AS SR_STATUS, A.CR_DT, A.CR_EMPID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_EMPID, B.DOC_TYPE FROM SR_DOC A, SR_CONFER B,SR_SYSTEM D WHERE 1=1 AND A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO(+) AND A.SR_SYSTEM=D.SYSTEMCD AND SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE([S_FR_DT],'-','') AND REPLACE([S_TO_DT],'-','') AND UPPER(SR_TITLE) LIKE '%'||UPPER([S_SR_TITLE])||'%' AND (DOC_TYPE LIKE [S_SR_DOC_TYPE]||'%' OR NVL([S_SR_DOC_TYPE],DOC_TYPE) IS NULL) AND (CONF_TYPE LIKE [S_SR_CONF_TYPE]||'%' OR NVL([S_SR_CONF_TYPE],CONF_TYPE) IS NULL) AND SR_EMPID LIKE [S_SR_EMPID]||'%' AND SR_TYPE LIKE [S_SR_TYPE]||'%' AND SR_SYSTEM LIKE [S_SR_SYSTEM]||'%' ) WHERE 1=1 AND SR_REV_EMPID LIKE '%'||[S_SR_REV_EMPID]||'%' ORDER BY FIN_DT, SR_NO

SELECT A.SR_NO, SR_TITLE, SR_DT, SR_EMPID, TO_EMPKNAME(SR_EMPID) AS SR_EMPID_NM, C.CONF_EMPID, TO_EMPKNAME(C.CONF_EMPID)||'('||C.CONF_EMPID||')' AS SR_REV_EMPID_NM, TEL, SR_ORGCD, TO_ORGNM(SR_ORGCD) AS SR_ORGNM, FIN_DT, P_EFP, SR_TYPE, TO_CDNM(SR_TYPE,'SR_GB') AS SR_TYPE_NM, VALUE_TYPE, TO_CDNM(VALUE_TYPE,'VALUE_TYPE') AS VALUE_TYPE_NM, URGENT_TYPE, TO_CDNM(URGENT_TYPE,'URGENT_TYPE') AS URGENT_TYPE_NM, SR_SYSTEM_CD AS SR_SYSTEM, SR_SYSTEM_NM, EFFECT_COMMENT, SR_REASON, SR_REASON_DETAIL, RELEASE_YN, DEVORG_COMMENT, REVORG_COMMENT, FID, PID, TO_CDNM(B.DOC_TYPE,'SR_DOC_GB')||'-'|| TO_CDNM(B.STATUS,'SR_STATUS') AS SR_STATUS, A.CR_DT, A.CR_EMPID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_EMPID, NVL(B.DOC_TYPE,'D010') AS DOC_TYPE FROM SR_DOC A, SR_CONFER B,SR_CONFER C,SR_SYSTEM D WHERE 1=1 AND A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO(+) AND A.SR_NO=C.SR_NO(+) AND A.SR_SYSTEM=D.SR_SYSTEM_CD(+) AND A.SR_NO =[S_SR_NO] AND (B.DOC_TYPE LIKE [S_DOC_TYPE]||'%' OR [S_DOC_TYPE] IS NULL)

SELECT '/images/CMS/'||CODENAME||(SELECT MAX('_') FROM SR_CONFER WHERE CODE=DOC_TYPE AND SR_NO=[S_SR_NO])||'.png' AS DOC_STATUS FROM COMCODE WHERE HIGHCODE='CD-20160407-001' AND DECODE([S_SR_NO],'','N','Y')='Y' ORDER BY IDX

SELECT a.SR_NO, DOC_TYPE, TO_CDNM(DOC_TYPE,'SR_DOC_GB') AS DOC_TYPE_NM, TO_CDNM(CONF_TYPE,'SR_STATUS')||DECODE(CONF_COMMENT,'','','(의견)') AS CONF_TYPE, CONF_EMPID, TO_EMPKNAME(CONF_EMPID) AS CONF_EMPNM, STATUS, TO_CHAR(CONF_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CONF_DT, CONF_COMMENT, CONF_SN, TO_CDNM(EGRADE,'EA') AS EGRADE, TO_ORGNM(TO_ORGCD(ORGCD)) AS ORGNM, SR_TITLE FROM SR_CONFER A,EMPALL B,SR_DOC C WHERE A.SR_NO =[S_SR_NO] AND DOC_TYPE LIKE NVL([S_DOC_TYPE],'D010') AND CONF_EMPID=EMPID(+) AND A.SR_NO=C.SR_NO ORDER BY STATUS DESC ,CONF_SN DESC

INSERT INTO SR_DOC ( SR_NO, SR_TITLE, SR_DT, SR_EMPID, TEL, SR_ORGCD, FIN_DT, P_EFP, SR_TYPE, VALUE_TYPE, URGENT_TYPE, SR_SYSTEM, EFFECT_COMMENT, SR_REASON, SR_REASON_DETAIL, RELEASE_YN, DEVORG_COMMENT, REVORG_COMMENT, FID, PID, CR_DT, CR_EMPID ) VALUES( GET_SEQ('SR-HX'), [SR_TITLE], REPLACE([SR_DT],'-',''), [SR_EMPID], [TEL], [SR_ORGCD], REPLACE([FIN_DT],'-',''), [P_EFP], [SR_TYPE], [VALUE_TYPE], [URGENT_TYPE], [SR_SYSTEM], [EFFECT_COMMENT], [SR_REASON], [SR_REASON_DETAIL], [RELEASE_YN], [DEVORG_COMMENT], [REVORG_COMMENT], [FID], [PID], SYSDATE, [CR_EMPID] )
DELETE FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_NO=[SR_NO]

UPDATE SR_DOC SET SR_TITLE=[SR_TITLE], SR_DT=REPLACE([SR_DT],'-',''), SR_EMPID=[SR_EMPID], TEL=[TEL], SR_ORGCD=[SR_ORGCD], FIN_DT=REPLACE([FIN_DT],'-',''), P_EFP=[P_EFP], SR_TYPE=[SR_TYPE], VALUE_TYPE=[VALUE_TYPE], URGENT_TYPE=[URGENT_TYPE], SR_SYSTEM=[SR_SYSTEM], EFFECT_COMMENT=[EFFECT_COMMENT], SR_REASON=[SR_REASON], SR_REASON_DETAIL=[SR_REASON_DETAIL], RELEASE_YN=[RELEASE_YN], DEVORG_COMMENT=[DEVORG_COMMENT], REVORG_COMMENT=[REVORG_COMMENT], FID=[FID], PID=[PID], MOD_DT=SYSDATE, MOD_EMPID=[MOD_EMPID] WHERE SR_NO=[SR_NO]

INSERT INTO SR_CONFER (SELECT [SR_NO] ,NVL([DOC_TYPE],'D010') ,NVL([CONF_TYPE],'S040') ,SPLIT([TEMP_CONF_EMPID],ROWNUM,',') as CONF_EMPID ,[STATUS] AS STATUS ,'' AS CONF_DT ,'' AS CONF_COMMENT ,ROWNUM AS CONF_SN FROM DUAL WHERE SPLIT([TEMP_CONF_EMPID],ROWNUM,',') IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY LEVEL<10)
DELETE FROM SR_CONFER WHERE SR_NO= [SR_NO] AND DOC_TYPE=[DOC_TYPE] AND CONF_EMPID=[CONF_EMPID] AND CONF_SN LIKE [CONF_SN]||'%'
UPDATE SR_CONFER SET ,CONF_TYPE=[CONF_TYPE] WHERE SR_NO= [SR_NO] AND DOC_TYPE=[DOC_TYPE] AND CONF_EMPID LIKE [CONF_EMPID] AND CONF_SN LIKE [CONF_SN]

INSERT INTO SR_ADJ ( SR_NO, SR_MOD_DT, ACCEPT_DT, SR_TYPE, VALUE_TYPE, URGENT_TYPE, SR_SYSTEM, MOD_NOTE, CR_DT, CR_EMPID ) VALUES( [SR_NO], SYSDATE, REPLACE([ACCEPT_DT],'-',''), [SR_TYPE], [VALUE_TYPE], [URGENT_TYPE], [SR_SYSTEM], [MOD_NOTE], SYSDATE, [CR_EMPID] )
DELETE FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_NO=[SR_NO]

UPDATE SR_ADJ SET SR_MOD_DT=SYSDATE ,ACCEPT_DT=REPLACE([ACCEPT_DT],'-','') ,SR_TYPE=[SR_TYPE] ,VALUE_TYPE=[VALUE_TYPE] ,URGENT_TYPE=[URGENT_TYPE] ,SR_SYSTEM=[SR_SYSTEM] ,MOD_NOTE=[MOD_NOTE] ,MOD_DT=SYSDATE ,MOD_EMPID=[MOD_EMPID] WHERE SR_NO=[SR_NO]

SELECT SR_NO, SR_MOD_DT, ACCEPT_DT, SR_TYPE, TO_CDNM(SR_TYPE,'SR_GB') AS SR_TYPE_NM, VALUE_TYPE, URGENT_TYPE, SR_SYSTEM, SR_SYSTEM_NM, MOD_NOTE, A.CR_DT, A.CR_EMPID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_EMPID FROM SR_ADJ A,SR_SYSTEM D WHERE 1=1 AND SR_NO =[S_SR_NO] AND A.SR_SYSTEM=D.SR_SYSTEM_CD(+) AND SR_MOD_DT IN (SELECT MAX(SR_MOD_DT) FROM SR_ADJ B WHERE B.SR_NO=A.SR_NO)

INSERT INTO SR_WORKER (SELECT [SR_NO] ,SPLIT([TEMP_WORKER_EMPID],ROWNUM,',') as SR_WORKER ,'' ,SYSDATE ,[CR_EMPID] ,'' ,'' FROM DUAL WHERE SPLIT([TEMP_WORKER_EMPID],ROWNUM,',') IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY LEVEL<20)

SELECT A.SR_NO, SR_WORKER, TO_EMPKNAME(SR_WORKER) AS SR_WORKER_NM, SR_PLAN_YN, A.CR_DT, A.CR_EMPID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_EMPID , RELEASE_YN, DEVORG_COMMENT FROM SR_WORKER A, SR_DOC B WHERE 1=1 AND A.SR_NO =[S_SR_NO] AND A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO
UPDATE SR_WORKER SET SR_PLAN_YN=DECODE([SR_PLAN_YN],'Y','Y','N'), MOD_DT=SYSDATE, MOD_EMPID=[MOD_EMPID] WHERE 1=1 AND SR_NO =[SR_NO] AND SR_WORKER =[SR_WORKER]
DELETE SR_WORKER WHERE 1=1 AND SR_NO =[SR_NO] AND SR_WORKER =[SR_WORKER]
UPDATE SR_DOC SET RELEASE_YN=[RELEASE_YN] ,DEVORG_COMMENT=[DEVORG_COMMENT] ,MOD_DT=SYSDATE ,MOD_EMPID=[MOD_EMPID] WHERE 1=1 AND SR_NO =[SR_NO]
SELECT CONF_EMPID AS CODE_NO ,CONF_EMPID AS CODE ,TO_EMPKNAME(CONF_EMPID) AS CODENAME ,CONF_SN FROM SR_CONFER A WHERE SR_NO = [S_SR_NO] AND STATUS=[S_STATUS] ORDER BY CONF_SN
UPDATE SR_CONFER SET CONF_SN = [p0] WHERE SR_NO = [p2] AND STATUS=[p3] AND CONF_EMPID=[p1]
UPDATE SR_CONFER SET CONF_TYPE=[CONF_TYPE] ,CONF_DT=SYSDATE WHERE SR_NO= [SR_NO] AND DOC_TYPE=[DOC_TYPE] AND CONF_EMPID LIKE [CONF_EMPID] AND CONF_SN LIKE [CONF_SN]||'%'
SELECT * FROM SR_CONFER WHERE SR_NO= [SR_NO] AND DOC_TYPE= [DOC_TYPE] AND CONF_EMPID=[CONF_EMPID]
UPDATE SR_CONFER SET CONF_COMMENT=[CONF_COMMENT] WHERE SR_NO= [SR_NO] AND DOC_TYPE= [DOC_TYPE] AND CONF_EMPID=[CONF_EMPID]

SELECT LEVEL AS LEV, A.SYSTEMCD, A.SYSTEMNM, A.STARTDT, A.ENDDT, (SELECT SYSTEMCD FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE SYSTEMCD=A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD) AS HIGH_SYSTEMCD, A.SYSTEM_GB, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SR_SYSTEM B WHERE B.HIGH_SYSTEMCD=A.SYSTEMCD) AS SUBCNT, A.NOTE, (SELECT SYSTEMNM FROM SR_SYSTEM B WHERE A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD=B.SYSTEMCD) AS HIGH_SYSTEMNM FROM SR_SYSTEM A WHERE LEVEL<=S_LEVEL: AND SYSTEMNM LIKE '%'||[S_SYSTEMNM]||'%' START WITH (A.SYSTEMCD IN NVL([S_HIGH_SYSTEMCD], S_SYSTEMCD:)) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.SYSTEMCD=A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SYSTEMCD

SELECT LEVEL AS LEV, A.SYSTEMCD, A.SYSTEM_GB, (SELECT B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = 'SR_SYS_GB' AND B.CODE = A.SYSTEM_GB) AS SYSTEM_GBNM, A.SYSTEMNM, A.NOTE, A.STARTDT, A.ENDDT, A.SEQ, (SELECT SYSTEMNM FROM SR_SYSTEM B WHERE A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD=B.SYSTEMCD) AS HIGH_SYSTEMNM, (SELECT SYSTEMCD FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE SYSTEMCD=A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD) AS HIGH_SYSTEMCD FROM SR_SYSTEM A WHERE LEVEL=1 START WITH A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD = S_HIGH_SYSTEMCD: CONNECT BY PRIOR A.SYSTEMCD=A.HIGH_SYSTEMCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SEQ, A.SYSTEMCD
INSERT INTO SR_SYSTEM ( SYSTEMCD ,SYSTEMNM ,SYSTEM_GB ,HIGH_SYSTEMCD ,NOTE ,STARTDT ,ENDDT ) VALUES( [U_SYSTEMCD] ,[SYSTEMNM] ,[SYSTEM_GB] ,[HIGH_SYSTEMCD] ,[NOTE] ,[STARTDT] ,[ENDDT] )
DELETE FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE SYSTEMCD = [SYSTEMCD]
UPDATE SR_SYSTEM SET SYSTEMCD = [U_SYSTEMCD] ,SYSTEMNM=[SYSTEMNM] ,SYSTEM_GB=[SYSTEM_GB] ,HIGH_SYSTEMCD=[HIGH_SYSTEMCD] ,NOTE=[NOTE] ,STARTDT=[STARTDT] ,ENDDT=[ENDDT] WHERE SYSTEMCD = [SYSTEMCD]
UPDATE SR_SYSTEM SET SEQ = [p0] WHERE SYSTEMCD = [p1]
